name: COW library
short_description: COW is a cross-platform object-oriented workspace that provides a powerful API for RTTI, serialization, streaming, mathematics(bitwise, fixed point, vectors and more), storage containers and lots more. Unit tests and tutorial projects are included.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
